overview: Temperatures are rising in this small town and Kylie Ireland is turning up the heat! Bored and frustrated, this red-headed honey creates her own excitement with labe-lovin girlfriends Adrianna Sage and Zana. Cheating husbands, outdoor sex, an anal rendezvous, and a mysterious stranger gets everyone's panties wet! They're stealing more than kisses in these ball-draining blockbuster!
tagline: Their Lips Will Never Be the Same!
title: To Steal a Kiss
